local_files.description: BXT Fulfillment Galaxy (export Confluence page to PDF and save here)
Company architecture guide (add your file path)

how_to_use: 1. Export your Confluence/SharePoint pages to PDF
2. Save PDFs to local folders (e.g., comcast_docs/)
3. Add file paths to 'local_files' or directory paths to 'directories' above
4. Set 'enabled': true for sources you want to load
6. Or the system will auto-load enabled sources on startup
_instructions.note: For Confluence and SharePoint content, export pages to PDF for best results
